item.title: @elonmusk: More Americans have died from Biden and Harris‚Äôs open border policies than from 75 years of U.S. war...
item.description: More Americans have died from Biden and Harris‚Äôs open border policies than from 75 years of U.S. wars Since 1945, total U.S. combat deaths across Korea, Vietnam, the Gulf wars, Afghanistan, and the GWOT add up to about 103,000 In one year under Biden, over 110,000 Americans died from fentanyl and illicit drug overdoses That‚Äôs why the cartels are the enemy that's why the President Trump designated them as terrorists

item.title: @elonmusk: Stretch goal for Starship V4 is 300 tons of thrust per engine with 33 engines, so 10,000 tons of tot...
item.description: Stretch goal for Starship V4 is 300 tons of thrust per engine with 33 engines, so 10,000 tons of total thrust. That is 3 times the power of the Saturn V Moon rocket.

item.title: @elonmusk: The problem is that next time the senate flips, the left will break the filibuster immediately and p...
item.description: The problem is that next time the senate flips, the left will break the filibuster immediately and pass no voter ID nationally. After that, the senate will become supermajority left forever, like California.

item.title: @elonmusk: Business Insider review of FSD (Supervised) V14: "FSD proved to be a highly capable driver ‚Äî so much...
item.description: Business Insider review of FSD (Supervised) V14: "FSD proved to be a highly capable driver ‚Äî so much so that it has spoiled me into wishing that I didn't have to constantly babysit the system. At no point did I need to disengage FSD or question the system enough to take over the steering wheel.@TeslaFSD is a smooth and cautious driver. There were a few highlights. One was when FSD was cautious around pedestrians on Berkeley's campus. I recall a student who wasn't using the crosswalk but was close to it, walking across the road. FSD came to a rolling stop rather than an abrupt halt, which is exactly how I would've handled the situation. The system also managed to navigate the university's roads and perform a three-point turn when I stopped the car and added a new destination."

item.title: @elonmusk: Under the made-up blue slip rule, for a Trump judge or US Attorney nomination to go forward for appr...
item.description: Under the made-up blue slip rule, for a Trump judge or US Attorney nomination to go forward for approval, BOTH SENATORS, even from a Democrat state, must approve. Otherwise Grassley won't send the nominee forward. Because of the blue slip system, there are entire judicial regions (the 9th Circuit) where it's known by lawyers and other judges that the law doesn't apply. There's no way to reform the system, because the Senate won't change the rules. This also means that Trump, despite winning the popular vote and 7 for 7 swing states, cannot appoint US Attorneys who will enforce the will of the American people. One Democrat can veto anything. Even worse, there are line attorneys inside DOJ who are working to protect Democrats. They were hired by Biden. There's no way to remove them, because Trump cannot put his own US Atty inside the office. The blue slip system is made up, by the way. It's not in law. Grassley could end it today. Why won't he?

item.title: @elonmusk: The difference between a conspiracy theory and the truth? About 6 months. This one is extremely dist...
item.description: The difference between a conspiracy theory and the truth? About 6 months. This one is extremely disturbing. Turns out mass immigration by flooding tens of millions of illegal immigrants under the Biden and Mayorkas regime was not incompetence. Democrats importing foreign voters is pure evil, anti-democratic, anti-American, and far worse than the current effort to uphold the law and deport those who are here illegally üá∫üá∏
